result.execSummary:
The defendant Isaiah K Trenton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Pay all mandatory court costs, fees and surcharges by 9/6/2016 or civil judgment will be entered.
Complete high school diploma/GED.  Obtain/maintain employment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah K Trenton

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
AS TO COUNT 1
Court withheld sentence and placed defendant on probation for 1 YEAR with the following conditions:

-Complete High School Diploma/GED
-Obtain/maintain employment
-Pay all mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges by 9/6/2016, or a civil judgment will be entered. 

Filed, 
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief, Pretrial Incarceration Form, and Letter of behalf of defendant.

Defendant Isaiah K Trenton in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Parties have reached a resolution.  

AS TO COUNT 1
Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire, Addendum, and Elements received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.

Defendant Isaiah K Trenton in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-04-2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47. lr  Status conference scheduled for 08-03-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Isaiah K Trenton in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. suppression motion proceeded. Sworn in for the State: Officer Jasmine Moody. Officer John Majerle. State rests. Defense rests. Testimony closed. Cause argued. Court Denied Defense motion.

Attorney Michael Jude in court.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant's appearance is excused.   Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch  47. lr  Motion hearing scheduled for 07-09-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Isaiah K Trenton in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Tyrone Martin St. Junior appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 47.  Defense filed a suppression motion. lr  Motion hearing scheduled for 06-12-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Isaiah K Trenton in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 04-23-2015 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 03-10-2015 at 01:30 pm.

As an additional condition of bail:
No weapons
No firearms

Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Isaiah K Trenton in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
OCCR Tape#15-025
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.
Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 47 for a Pretrial Conference.
Clerk:  jms
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 2/6/15 @ 1:30 pm
